# Tender for Window Cleaning Services: Request for Proposal

## Important Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-5800-13611689
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-23
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-06-21T16:00:00

## Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for window cleaning services. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing all labor, equipment, and materials for exterior and interior window cleaning at specified RCMP buildings in Regina, Saskatchewan. The cleaning schedule will be twice per year, during the spring (between April 15th and June 30th) and fall (between September 1st and November 15th).

## Contract Period

The contract period will be for three years from the date of the contract, with an optional extension for up to two additional one-year periods.

## Basis of Selection

The selection will be based on the lowest evaluated price. To be considered responsive, bidders must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document.

## Attachments and Supporting Documents

To obtain further information, please refer to the attached tender documents available on the [Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) or the [Bid Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5800/202101555---rfp---en---v01---window-cleaning.pdf).

## Notices and Procurement

- **Indigenous Procurement**: The RCMP has adopted the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) and encourages bidders to consider registering for the IBD to increase their business opportunities.
- **Contact Information**: For further information, please contact Sheena Simonson, Procurement Officer, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, at (306) 515-1653 or sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

This rewritten entry maintains the importance of the tender announcement while rephrasing the text for a more professional and concise format. The rewritten entry accurately conveys the essential information of the original text without unnecessary descriptions.
